Eddie Kasalivich.Action: Peers closely at the injector he recently installed, smiles in satisfaction at the ongoing process, and watches the nozzle expectantly during the experiment.
Agrees readily to Bucky's idea to build a variable frequency device and begins sketching without hesitation.
Absorbed in his own sketching during group conversation, shows limited direct engagement with others.
Affirms he can build a device with a variable frequency when asked by Bucky, responds confidently with 'Sure. Why not?' and immediately begins sketching ideas.
Grins and humorously admits to only 'mostly' doing the reading and trading comics with Chen, showing a light, friendly interaction.
Hands Shannon a physics book to demonstrate effort, showing sincerity and responsibility.
Does not engage in the group discussion about missing input, remains silent and detached.
Assures Lily he will have the missing input tomorrow, showing confidence in resolving the problem.
Admits to only mostly doing the reading and trading comics with Chen instead of fully focusing on study materials.
Demonstrates humor and self-awareness by acknowledging his limited study habits, indicating some social ease but less seriousness about competence.
Carefully crafts the acoustic nozzle on the lathe, feeling it with his fingers to ensure quality.
Removes safety goggles and looks blankly when asked to explain a technical term, indicating possible lack of understanding.
Installs the acoustic nozzle inside the water tank, showing practical skill and responsibility.
Moves closer to the tank, peers down through the water at the new nozzle, follows the progress closely, expresses excitement and runs to the console to monitor the meters showing the output rise.
Agrees to take a shot of the group for Lily and assists with the camera setup
Emerges from the lab to call Bucky for a picture
Holds out his hand to Lily to help her board the bus, showing concern for her comfort.
Engages in friendly banter with Lily, sharing a laugh and handing her his book.
Responds modestly and with a bit of self-deprecation about his skills and role on the team.
Shows reluctance to answer a difficult physics question, indicating possible hesitation or lack of confidence with complex material.
Uses hands to illustrate a physics problem clearly while explaining, demonstrating understanding and ability to communicate complex concepts.
Helps Lily inside and gently lays her on the bed, removing her shoes carefully.
Pauses and considers the slightly open door and dim lights at the mill lab before entering.
Keeps his head down and roars away on his bike as the mill explodes behind him.
Is physically overwhelmed by the shock wave, sent careening into the brush beside the road.
Immediately expresses belief in Lily when she says she is being framed, despite her warning that he doesn't know her and that there's no reason to trust him.
Sprints to catch up with Lily when she tries to walk away frightened, then urges her to trust someone and suggests that it might as well be him.
Listens carefully to Lily's concerns and attempts to understand the suspicious fax content.
Reassures Lily and insists that she trust him despite limited information, showing confidence and emotional intelligence.
Sprints to catch up with Lily when she tries to leave, demonstrating quick reaction and determination.
Does not attempt to further question or investigate the suspicious fax himself before reassuring Lily.
Moves quickly on foot away from surveillance to avoid being followed.
Speaks decisively about meeting Lily at a specific time and place without hesitation.
Does not react visibly or with alertness to fronts or threats such as the media attention (pictures on front page).
Risking his life by hiding in the bridge machinery to avoid cops and protect himself.
Runs frantically to catch the train but arrives too late and cannot get past the cops, then stops and accepts the situation without causing a scene.
Notices the old woman getting off the wrong train and takes advantage of the distraction to disappear from the platform.
Boards the train and confidently approaches Lily, sitting beside her and initiating conversation.
Interrupts Maggie to ask a clarifying question about the calls she made, showing attention to detail and an attempt to gather relevant information.
Follows watchman's vague directions without further questions or verification, indicating potential lack of initiative or assertiveness.
Leads Lily by the hand quickly away from cops, with Maggie hustling beside them.
Quickly takes phone from Maggie and communicates important information about fax origin; leads Lily away from approaching police and FBI agents.
Admits to Shannon that he is not secure despite imminent danger, showing realistic assessment of situation.
Refuses to stay put when ordered, chooses to come to Shannon despite apparent risk, indicating decisiveness but potentially impulsive.
Thinks quickly to respond to the raccoon coat man and successfully boards the bus under a false pretense.
Fumbles for his wallet when asked about payment for the second ticket.
Attempts to negotiate partial payment by offering sixty dollars on account and plans to get cash from a machine, showing awareness of his financial limits and willingness to communicate clearly.
Attempts to assume the identity of the Findlays and decides to register as they would, despite uncertainty on exact steps.
Declines Maxwell's offer of a double room politely.
Takes Lily by the arm and moves her away from the police, acting protectively.
Alerts the boater that police are coming and offers to hold his boat.
Quickly notices the arrival of police cars and immediately takes initiative by warning a boater and helping to take control of the situation.
Uncertain about their next move and admits 'I don't know' in response to where they're going.
Wraps Lily in a blanket, holds her tightly to comfort her when she is cold and shaking.
Whispers reassuring words to Lily, calming her down from distress.
Expresses clear trust in Shannon and shares a personal connection to him with Lily.
Gave a job and encouraged going back to school, believing in the person.
Gently woke Lily to leave before sunrise, showing consideration.
Encourages going back to school and believes in personal growth.
Knowingly starts a truck by using neighborhood knowledge and drains a lawnmower for gas.
Acts with calm urgency waking Lily to leave before sunrise.
Checks his watch to note they are early, showing awareness of timing.
Quickly spots Shannon entering the building despite the busy museum environment.
Notices the three men accompanying Shannon who then take up positions, demonstrating observational skill.
Becomes frozen and incredulous upon noticing the suspicious men, hesitates before reacting.
Questions Shannon thoughtfully, stays cautious and demands explanations before acting.
When pursued, immediately takes action by sprinting and attempting to escape, showing presence of mind and quick reaction.
Uses nearby object (club) as a weapon to fend off an attacker effectively.
Leaps up on the 727 engine pod and scrambles over the fuselage to escape pursuers, then vaults over railing on opposite balcony, showing physical agility and quick thinking.
Melts into shadows on the bridge of an aircraft carrier under full alert, effectively hiding from pursuers.
Moves along crowded corridor with tourists, trying to stay invisible while searching frantically for Lily, showing situational awareness.
Stops abruptly when spotting Lily, indicating attentiveness and prioritization of his goal.
Slams fist against glass in frustration upon seeing Lily being taken away, then immediately notices an exit and runs after the van, showing persistence and quick reactive decision-making.
Runs after the van despite being out of breath, notices and interprets the scrawled message on the van indicating hostile intent.
Chooses to escape via a less obvious route by entering a door under the museum and navigating the steam tunnel, showing resourcefulness and situational awareness.
Peeks out from a restricted area, moves quietly into a tour group to avoid detection, demonstrating stealth and caution.
Appears aimless and moody while walking alone at night, hunching his shoulders against the cold with eyes on the pavement, indicating possible discouragement or mental distraction.

Checks a restaurant window for a cheap meal but quickly realizes he does not have enough money and moves on, showing awareness of his limited resources but also his limited ability to change the situation.
Stops and turns to look at the homeless man Larry after ignoring him initially.
Wears Larry's clothes at the soup kitchen and shares the food with him, giving Larry the extra sandwich.
Does not acknowledge the homeless man initially, avoiding engagement.
Stops and stares at Larry after initially ignoring him, indicating awareness and consideration.
Adapts to wearing homeless man's clothes and looks comfortable among destitute people.
Puts sandwich on Larry's plate, showing empathy and social awareness.
Persists optimistically after rejection suggesting to follow the trucks and see where they go.
Leaves the car without telling Larry, disappearing unexpectedly by the gate.
Sneaks out of hiding, blends in with workers, appropriates a security badge to gain access.
Studies blueprints to orient himself at the construction site.
Navigates through a vent pipe after encountering a huge door blocking progress.
Awkwardly bumps into a man upon entering elevator area, showing a moment of unease or lack of smooth interaction.
Navigates through a narrow vent pipe with effort, then successfully assesses the pump room and evaluates the tunnel options before proceeding.
Recognizes the inability of others to get the invention to work and expresses skepticism about their competence.
Responds cautiously to the offer, considering the stakes and risks (asks 'What if I say no?').
Writes on his palm 'Don't trust them' after Lily warns him with 'bugged,' showing awareness and caution.
Requests access to Chen, a necessary collaborator, demonstrating understanding of what resources or people he needs.
Conducts a careful and rapid inspection of the hospital ward for bugs, finds the hidden listening device skillfully.
Simulates Chen's breathing using a hot water bottle to fool the surveillance bug, displaying creativity and presence of mind.
Sits calmly holding Chen's hand while under surveillance, maintaining composure in a tense situation.
Shapes the nozzle carefully at the lathe under the watch of scientists, demonstrating skill and attention to detail.
Passes the nozzle to scientists for inspection confidently after his adjustments.
Slips a metal cylinder into his pocket while scientists are distracted.
Works under the water tank placing the nozzle carefully in its housing despite observation, removes old housing skillfully.
Allows the old housing to disappear after replacement while others are watching, implying a secretive omission.
Overwrites Lily's note with a series of figures, indicating active engagement and contribution to technical details.
Maintains a calm and confident demeanor when confronted by Shannon's accusations, responding with deflection and challenge.
Refuses to directly admit or explain the plan when questioned, potentially indicating evasiveness or uncertainty.
Clears the form just before it closes, saving himself and Lily and avoiding being crushed by the guard.
Emerges from the tunnel with Lily into daylight amidst the radiation alarm and runs towards safety with the crowd.
Works diligently on prototype nozzles inspired by Bucky's vision of ending pollution and war.
Sits alone in the back of the classroom, separated from others.

Sketches a new acoustic nozzle during a lecture, later builds and tests a prototype in his basement workshop with sound equipment, carefully crafting the nozzle's horn on a lathe and paying attention to the tactile feedback.

Works alone in his basement with a crammed, improvised workshop but manages to produce a functional, sound-emitting prototype that generates a significant audible effect, indicating practical skill and problem-solving.
Quietly focuses on his machining work without engaging much in social interaction.
Responds politely with a simple 'Hello' to Dr. Collier's introduction, without displaying warmth but not being unfriendly.
Moves closer to the tank to observe the new nozzle, visibly excited and practically runs to the console to see the meters registering the output
Agrees to take a photo for the group promptly and helps with the camera setup.
Calls out to Bucky to alert him for a photo moment.
Offers to drive Lily home when her car won't start, notices she is cold and walks with her.
Grins wryly to himself as Lily inserts herself between him and Bucky, not showing jealousy but quietly observing.
Encourages Lily to test him on difficult physics problems, showing patience and interest.
Explains physics problems gently and clearly, even when Lily falls asleep on his shoulder.
Carries Lily half way up to her apartment, supporting her gently.
Finds Bucky unconscious with a plastic bag over his head, immediately tries to save him by administering CPR and calling for help.
Immediately attempts to resuscitate Bucky by removing the plastic bag, giving mouth-to-mouth, and performing chest compressions.
Quickly searches for a phone to call for help despite the shock and stress.
Struggles to access working communication lines when phones are dead or cut.
He pauses and sniffs the air, indicating he is trying to assess the situation further despite limited options.
Attempts to shut leaking hydrogen valve to prevent hazard
Freezes with fear and slowly retreats from lab with dangerous gas leak
Runs away from danger to protect himself rather than stay to face potential explosion
Detects hissing gas leaks from hydrogen and oxygen tanks and tries to shut the valve.
Realizes the valve won't shut and slowly exits the lab, showing awareness of danger.
Initially frozen with fear in the presence of the gas leak, delaying immediate action.
Pushes the bike first to avoid starting it near the leak, then cautiously starts it and escapes quickly.
Offers to return for his bike and admits to helping Miss Naughton by taking her home when her car wouldn’t start because she had been drinking.
Responds plainly and without elaboration when questioned about his relationship with Miss Naughton, showing straightforwardness but emotional reserve.
Explains clearly his connection to Miss Naughton and his role as a machinist without hesitation.
Appears calm and straightforward under interrogation, answering questions directly without confusion.
Mentions coming back for his bike, showing he remembers personal belongings and plans appropriately.
Faces a shouting mob of reporters, apologizes sincerely for not knowing any information.
Is described as good at what he does and was hired for his skills in a machine shop.
Appears overwhelmed by reporters and admits he does not know anything about the situation.
Follows Lily to the kitchen and tries to engage her about the situation with concern, asking where Lu Chen might be.
Listens quietly as Lily expresses fear and distance, does not immediately comfort or reassure her.
Does not push Lily to open up after she abruptly ends the interaction and asks him to leave.
Engages in a calm conversation with Lily about a developing crisis, asks thoughtful questions about Lu Chen’s whereabouts, and shows concern without jumping to conclusions.
Fails to provide reassurance or concrete answers to Lily’s fears, leading to a breakdown in communication and emotional distress.
Staying overnight on Lily's couch uninvited, watching over her when she is groggy and alone.
Stays overnight to keep Lily company because he thinks she shouldn't be alone, showing consideration and emotional support.
Appears groggy and bleary-eyed after sleeping on the couch, suggesting possible fatigue or lack of alertness.
Approaches Shannon with Lily to ask for help and explains the situation to clear Lily’s name.
Expresses shock and denies knowledge about the suspicious bag of cash found in his closet.
Quietly leaves the bar without confrontation, avoids conflict
Attempts to evade police by running into dangerous traffic
During a desperate escape, briefly makes eye contact with a pursuing cop who is slipping, showing a moment of shared human struggle.
Continues to evade police after blowing up a lab and endangers himself and others in the dangerous stunt on the bridge.
Slides under the crossing arm and leaps onto the bridge deck, evading cops who are close behind.
Scrambles up the icy, tilting bridge incline and uses the side rail like a ladder to climb higher, despite difficult conditions.
Maintains grip and composure while clinging to the edge of the rising bascule eight stories high, managing a dangerous situation with physical skill and presence of mind.
Manages to inch up on top of the bridge and avoid falling despite harsh conditions.
Grabs a pipe while falling and slides down like a fireman, demonstrating quick thinking and agility.
Loses footing and begins sliding toward dangerous gears, unable to stop himself completely.
Inches along a narrow beam within a dangerous bridge counterweight area, using shadows to hide and avoiding detection by cops.
Trapped between steel beams and sweating under pressure as cops scan the area, showing tension and vulnerability.
Falls into the machinery earlier, potentially a sign of miscalculation or loss of control.
Riskily maneuvers through closing beams and police to escape capture, showing focus on self-preservation rather than helping others.
Escapes from a dangerous position between two closing steel beams at the last second.
Leaps and catches the edge of the closing bridge gap and slithers through before it closes.
Moves stealthily on knees and elbows under multiple cars to avoid cops.
Runs into the station and nearly knocks down a red cap with luggage, showing urgency but some lack of caution.
Attempts to catch the train despite crowd and police presence; makes a sincere effort.
Sits down beside Lily and asks if the seat is taken, initiating friendly contact.
Tries to hide his face and slows down when failing to catch the train, showing vulnerability and restraint.
Interrupts Maggie abruptly when she reveals she has been calling Lily all night, questioning if she left a message.
Gently hushes Lily to keep her quiet and safe when the watchman is nearby.
Collaborates with Lily in figuring out how to trace the fax number without endangering their location.
Identifies the potential risk of sending a fax back to the sender and looks for a safer alternative communication method.
Uses caution by hushing Lily when the watchman approaches, indicating awareness of their surroundings and potential danger.
Relies on Lily to help check the origin of the fax number, showing collaborative problem-solving rather than unilaterally handling the issue.
Peers out the window, notices buses, interacts calmly with Maggie and Lily, asks insightful questions about the fax message.
Changes clothes to blend in, appears prepared and aware of surroundings.
Does not take visible initiative in the conversation beyond asking questions and observing.
Accepts hugs from Maggie and Lily without hesitation.
Acts quickly and cooperatively with the raccoon coat man to board the bus.
Fumbles for his wallet when asked to pay for a second ticket without complaint.
Takes Lily on a risky ice boat escape, seems confident and shares his sailing experience with her.
Sees the second ice boat just in time and yanks his rudder hard to avoid a collision, showing quick reaction.
Clips the other boat, damages his boat severely, resulting in a crash and dumping himself and Lily into the snowbank.
Quickly reacts to danger from a rifle shot by digging a snow cave to hide and cover themselves effectively.
Breaks into a summer house at night to provide shelter and care for Lily, quickly addressing her cold and fatigue with warmth and comfort.
Recognizes the urgency and danger of their situation and insists on moving to find Shannon, despite Lily's fears.
Shows emotional support and calmness in a crisis, which helps to stabilize Lily's condition.
Encourages Lily to buckle up and hold on, showing care for her safety during a risky maneuver.
Takes charge in a tense situation by finding an alternative route, demonstrating trustworthiness and support.
Focuses on escaping the roadblock with urgency but does not display explicit friendliness or tolerance in this excerpt.
Notices the roadblock quickly and decides to take an alternative route by heading off-road through a farm lane, demonstrating quick thinking and adaptability.
Attempts to breach a snow fence by driving the truck through it at high speed, showing decisiveness and willingness to take calculated risks.
Gets stuck in the snow and slush after breaching the fence, failing to get the truck fully through and immobilizing the vehicle.
Encourages Lily patiently while trying to get the truck unstuck, giving clear guidance and complimenting her effort.
Directs Lily carefully on how to get the truck unstuck, showing understanding of vehicle control and patience; successfully helps get the truck moving and back onto the road.
Continuously pushes physically and gives clear verbal guidance under pressure.
Shows relief and recognition upon seeing Shannon, attempts to alert Lily.
Freezes in place, incredulous and silent when noticing potential threat.
Warns Lily to run to protect her from pursuers.
Physically defends against pursuers to protect both himself and Lily.
Questions Shannon suspiciously about his friends and intentions.
Looks around frantically for Lily while trying to stay invisible
Slams his fist against the glass in frustration upon seeing Lily taken away
Runs after the van despite being out of breath.
Eases quietly into a tour group to avoid detection, gently closes door behind him.
Walks aimlessly, appears dark and hunched over against the cold.
Looks into a cheap Chinese restaurant but cannot afford a meal and moves on without interaction.
Passes a homeless man panhandling but no indication of interaction or aid.
Responds immediately and respectfully to the cop's instruction without hesitation.
Apologizes politely after bumping into a man at the elevator.
Sneaks around the construction site, taking blueprints and entering restricted areas without permission.
Stops and observes the duplicate lab with stupefied amazement, does not react with hostility or panic.
Responds to Shannon's attempts at friendliness with guarded skepticism, refuses food and drink.
Directly calls Shannon a liar, showing blunt honesty and mistrust.
Expresses anger and betrayal when learning about Shannon's deception and the betrayal of Bucky's ideals; shows emotional vulnerability by nearly weeping.
Defends Bucky's intention to give away his invention freely, opposing greed and exploitation.
Questions Shannon about the planted money and the motives behind actions, seeks clarity on complex situations.
Challenges unethical behavior and refuses to accept lies and betrayals easily.
Expresses emotional overwhelm and vulnerability openly, showing less control in tense situations.
Lily embraces Eddie tightly and warns him by writing on her palm that the room is bugged; Eddie writes back 'Don't trust them' and embraces her again.
Thinks 'Dumb motherfuckers' about the people who can't make the invention work, shaking his head.
Passes the nozzle to the scientists, allowing them to inspect it carefully
Slips a metal cylinder into his pocket while scientists inspect the nozzle
Sits next to Lily in the lunchroom, quietly focused on the work
Nods at Lily's notes, indicating shared understanding or respect for her work.
Responds ambiguously and evasively when confronted by Shannon about suspicious activities, refusing to cooperate or clarify.
Challenges Shannon to figure out the secret, showing defiance rather than openness.
Expresses deep emotional pain over Bucky's death and the loss of their shared dream, indicating strong personal loyalty and sincerity.
Slips his hand around Lily's and intertwines their fingers, showing tenderness and connection.
Rejects the idea of starting a new life if it means being part of betrayal or wrongdoing, showing integrity.
Accuses Shannon of lying and throwing away their family, demonstrating distrust and emotional conflict.
Uses a makeshift pistol to force Collier and others to pull the alarm and clear the tunnel, prioritizing others' safety.
Points the pistol at Shannon to compel cooperation under threat.
Recognizes the danger and immediately takes control by ordering to pull the alarm and evacuate the area, showing decisiveness and situational awareness.
Uses a makeshift pistol to assert authority, indicating resourcefulness and quick thinking under pressure.
Threatening with a crude weapon may suggest a desperate bluff, showing a possible lack of real power but trying to compensate with confidence.
Drops his pistol to the floor to de-escalate the standoff and prevent harm.
Returns the pistol to Collier's temple, escalating tension.
Follows Shannon's order to call 911 and request FBI help in an emergency.
Grabs Lily's hand and reassures her during a claustrophobic escape, helping her fight panic.
Holds Lily's hand and tries to reassure her during a claustrophobic, panicking moment
Pulls Lily to safety at the last moment during a life-threatening situation
Encourages and physically helps Lily onto the conveyor belt despite danger.
Protects Lily by attacking the pursuing guard, risking his own safety.
Acts decisively under pressure to help Lily survive.
Takes swift initiative to get onto the conveyor belt and directs Lily to do the same.
Notices and points out the pipe across the conveyor belt as an escape opportunity.
Physically subdues the pursuing guard by skillfully kicking him, preventing harm to himself and Lily.
Moves quickly and confidently with Lily hand over hand to safety and escapes.
Escapes the secret facility explosion along with Lily and reaches safety despite the chaos and rumbling earth.
No direct action depicted demonstrating problem-solving or control over the crisis; primarily reacting and holding onto Lily.
